body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Once per day, whenever a member of this race takes damage, it flies into a frenzy for 1 minute, gaining a +2 racial bonus to Constitution and Strength, but a –2 penalty to AC.
name: Frenzy
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Frenzy
